name: Animus - Storm of Talos
description:
DOWNLOAD ANIMUS OR FULL SCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

You wake up in a forgotten jungle with dreams of a different world. Your perspective is warped, and to fix this, you must traverse the ruins to seek salvation from Soleil and Phoebe. They caused this, and they can fix it.

Animus is a game which pits you with the ability to change your perspective of the world, allowing you to see and interact with things previously untouchable. Play through 8 different levels and traverse the world you once took for granted. Complete the challenges the fastest, and gloat to your comrades  (yes, we added a speedrun timer, put your best times below cx). 

Controls:

LMB (Left Mouse Button Click) - Switch between Human and Spirit form (and interacting with buttons)

A and D - Left and Right

Space -  Single jump as a Human, Double Jump as a Spirit

HINT: Increase your potential jumps by switching to Spirit mid-air, allowing you to complete jumps previously impossible!
